name: Lure of the Temptress
description:
This script will install "Lure of the Temptress" extra download from  ScummVM for ScummVM.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Free download from https://www.scummvm.org/games/#lure
- Mulltilanguage: you can choose your preferred game language during install between English (default), French, German, Italian and Spanish.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Lure of the Temptress - ScummVM extra - ScummVM

content:
custom-name: Lure of the Temptress - ScummVM extra - ScummVM
files:
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Lure%20of%20the%20Temptress/clean.sh
game:
  game_id: lure
  path: $GAMEDIR/
  subtitles: true
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose your preferred game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - de: German
    - it: Italian
    - es: Spanish
    preselect: en
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG
    file: script
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
